#include <iostream>
using namespace std;

int main() {
	int a,b;
	scanf("%d %d",&a,&b);
	int count=0,rema,remb,carry;
	while(a!=0 && b!=0)
	{
		carry=0;
		count=0;
		while(a!=0 && b!=0)
		{
			rema=a%10;
			remb=b%10;
			if((rema+remb+carry)>9)
			{
				carry=1;
				count++;
			}
			else
				carry=0;
			a/=10;
			b/=10;
		}
		if(count==1)
			printf("1 carry operation.");
		else
		if(count>1)
			printf("%d carry operations.\n",count);
		else
			printf("No carry operation.\n");
		scanf("%d %d",&a,&b);
	}
	return 0;
}
